```{r warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
require(kaiaulu)
require(data.table)
require(knitr)
```

This is a wrapper for [Universal ctags](https://github.com/universal-ctags/ctags). See README.md for setup details.

```{r}
tool <- yaml::read_yaml("../tools.yml")
conf <- yaml::read_yaml("../conf/apr.yml")
utags_path <- tool[["utags"]]
git_repo_path <- conf[["data_path"]][["git"]]
```

A sample of rows is shown below: 

```{r}
kable(head(parse_line_type(utags_path,git_repo_path)[order(file_path,line_number)],10))
```
